title: Sermons preach'd upon several occasions By John Tillotson, D.D. Dean of Canterbury, preacher to the Honourable Society of Lincolns-Inn, and one of His Majesties chaplains in ordinary. The second volume.
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Edw. Gellibrand, and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke, at the Red-Lyon in St. Paul's-Church-Yard,
